name: Catminer 2 - New Adventures
description: Welcome, my friend, to CATMINER. The game where you can mine catcoins and be a cat. But there is much more than that! Rebirth to unlock new upgrades and menus, Spend Cat Treats on special upgrades, Use research to boost things, and more! Enjoy the ultimate clicker experience in Catminer 2 - New Adventures.
